description: The Male Singer, Type-4 emoji is a sequence of the  Man,  Emoji Modifier Fitzpatrick Type-4 and  Microphone emojis. These are combined
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the man singer with medium skin tone emoji is depicted with a confident posture, microphone in hand, ready to belt out a tune. Apple's signature glossy 3D shading gives the microphone a metallic sheen, while the singer's face, rendered with soft rounded edges and realistic lighting, conveys a sense of passionate performance. This emoji on Apple devices is a vibrant way to express enthusiasm for music, a great performance, or someone's vocal talent.
